text: 2|120|(he nabee!) aapase yahoodee tatha eesaee sahamat (prasann) nahin honge, jab tak aap unakee reeti par na chalen. kah do ki seedhee dagar vahee hai, jo allaah ne bataee hai aur yadi aapane unakee aakaankshaon ka anusaran kiya, isake pashchaat ki aapake paas gyaan aa gaya, to allaah (kee pakad) se aapaka koee rakshak aur sahaayak nahin hoga.
